de.fhws.hablame.chatbotbackend.repository

Interface ContentRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Content,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Content,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Content,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface ContentRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Content,java.lang.Long>
    Repository class for the Content model. This interface handles all persistence of this object with ORM.
    See Also:
    http://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/1.6.4.RELEASE/reference/html/jpa.repositories.html
